```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv('ptk_clean_20210331.csv')
head(df)
```

## model
```{r}
df$vot_z <- scale(df$vot_ms)
df$avg_phone_dur_z <- scale(df$avg_phone_dur_ms)
df$is_post_pausal <- as_factor(df$is_post_pausal)
contrasts(df$is_post_pausal) <- contrasts(df$is_post_pausal)-0.5
contrasts(df$is_post_pausal)
```

## model
```{r}
df$segment <- as_factor(df$segment)
contrasts(df$segment) <- contr.wec(x=df$segment, omitted = 'p')
contrasts(df$segment)
```

```{r}
df$language <- as_factor(df$language)
contrasts(df$language) <- contrasts(df$language)-0.5
contrasts(df$language)
```

```{r}
df$is_post_pausal <- as_factor(df$is_post_pausal)
contrasts(df$is_post_pausal) <- contrasts(df$is_post_pausal)
contrasts(df$is_post_pausal)
```



```{r}
mod <- lmer(
  formula = vot_z ~ 1 + segment * language + avg_phone_dur_z + (segment * language | talker),
  data = df
  )
summary(mod)
```
